Changing the waypayments
are made


ICPREM is payment platform that facilitates the payment of university dues by issuing digital receipts in the form of NFTs. Thanks to this, issues of security and authenticity of payments are dealt with









features

why chose ICPREM?


security

Thanks to the decentralized and immutable nature of blockchain, user data remain protectedd at all times.

authenticity

With ICPREM you will never worry about reciepts forgery, as all payments will be authenticated by the blockchain.

transparency

Thanks to blockchain, all transactions are recorded, making embezzlement impossible


payment made unique

By using ICP Sahara blockchain for payments, ICPREM deals with issues of security and authenticity of payments, while eliminating all possibilities of reciept misplacement and forgeries.
